website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but efficient and quiet. Requires a special rough-in mount – not an easy job.
cons: Difficult to install, may require a professional plumber
Requires 7 inches between water line and back of bowl

customer_reviews.title: What is not said is that the toilet (1) Must ...
customer_reviews.text: What is not said is that the toilet (1) Must be installed with a provided mount that requires two additional holes be drilled into the floor; and (2) you must have 7 or more inches between the back of the bowl and the fresh water line. The plumber was able to move the water line for installation of one of the two Vespin II's we ordered, but not the other. Amazon was very helpful in accepting the return of the one that could not be installed without tearing into the wall, but prospective buyers need to be aware of the two issues above before purchasing this particular Toto.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Worked in our older home to prevent a large gap by wall.
customer_reviews.text: I like the toilets style and water efficiency. Stays cleaner. Height is good. This toilet worked where we needed a larger flange to prevent a large gap behind the toilet and wall in our older home without doing modifications to the floor. Didn't like having to purchase the larger flange extra. Toilet is pricey but we like it.
customer_reviews.author: danbon

customer_reviews.title: Love the skirted design
customer_reviews.text: Got several of these for our bathroom renovation (including replacing a 5 GPF toilet from 1965 which we nicknamed the Exxon Valdez). A skirted toilet is MUCH easier to clean (the Vespin II is basically a skirted Drake), and the hard, glossy Toto finish stays clean. Also, a Toto rarely clogs and one flush is enough. That said, I liked an older Toto (ca. 2004) from my last house a bit better (totally skirted - this one has a small indentation in the base), and it flushed a bit better, but I think this is probably because the Vespin II uses even less water (1.28 GPF).
customer_reviews.author: Renee C. Ozer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toto when doing a bathroom renovation. It works perfectly and looks great. One thing to note is the base was much larger than the one I was replacing and required the water supply line to be moved about 10" to accommodate placing the rear of the toilet against the bathroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jamman

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the best toilet I have ever used. This is a top notch toilet that I recommend to friends and family. It’s expensive but it is worth the money. The easy to change rough in size was a large part of why I purchased this. I needed a 14” ROugh in and this was the best solution I found. I would purchase this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tolilet
customer_reviews.text: I loves Toto toilets. This is my third on in my house (all same model) and I have zero issues. The two biggest things I love about this particular one is that is NEVER gets clogged and the skirt design. I hate cleaning toilets and this design makes it a breeze. The 1.28 gal per flush is great as well. Can't beat the Totos.
customer_reviews.author: David Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect toilet
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, is easy to clean on the outside with the skirted design. Stays clean on the inside with the non-stick glaze and solid flush pattern. The only improvement I'd make is fix the fill valve setup to not make noise as it fills. Right now, you hear the water dripping and splashing as it refills. It's probably easy enough to switch out the fill valve with one that lets the water flow smoothly down to the bottom instead of falling and splashing. That one improvement will make this toilet perfect. I expect the toilet to impress everyone who doesn't know what they are missing with their cheapy toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Charvak Karpe

customer_reviews.title: Sanigloss really works!
customer_reviews.text: The sanigloss feature truly works - I'm shocked. We installed this toilet a month ago and I haven't needed to clean it yet. It's truly amazing. Our water bills are outrageous so I'm hoping the gallon flush helps. It has never clogged - I'm impressed. The only downside is that I don't think it's quite as comfortable to sit on as our previous toilet. But given the awesome features I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toilet
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Very good flush action with little water. The unit was shipped with very good packaging (won't break on you during handling). Only thing was the toilet seat was missing. Contacted seller, and was offered replacement toilet seat or 30% discount to purchase seat on our own. My wife chose the later. Had it for closed to 1 year now, and would say construction and function hold well. Maintenance is also minimal as nothing sticks to the inside of the bowl. We have hard water, and no ring around the water line. Flush mechanism placement is a little odd - mounted vertical so to flush you push the lever toward the wall/back of the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: macgandalf

customer_reviews.title: The one-gallon flush is amazing. Whoosh, it's all down!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and my brother-in-law replaced my water hog toilet with this one. First time I have an elongated toilet. It's comfortable especially with the new height. The one-gallon flush is amazing. Whoosh, it's all down! This toilet sits pretty in the bathroom. So shiny clean with its SaniGlos finish! So far, so good! Expensive (for me) but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donafrio

customer_reviews.title: Good value-Above expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several toilets to replace old ones in my home recently and of all of them, I like this one best. Easy to clean, fast flush, fast refill, low enough for my short legs and generally unobtrusive in the small spot where it sits.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Jake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how efficient this is
customer_reviews.text: The reviews of this product here pushed me to buy 2 of them. Installed three months ago and I just can't give this a score of less than 5. Amazing how efficient this is. Thanks to all of you for the candid reviews. So many flushes later with some big jobs and No Issues at all. still 5 stars Update: The hard water deposits found in AZ for example are a permanent mark on both toilets I had installed in 2014. other than that perfect results BUT at 400.00 plus there are cheaper as good toilets.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet for 14" rouch-in
customer_reviews.text: 120+ year old house. 14" rouch-in. Researched long time to find this Toto Vespin toilet. Had to order the 14" Rouch-in adapter from Amazon Market place (to save some money). Works really nice. Space saving as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kck

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet was a life saver for my bathroom. It is sleek looking, easy to install and love the fact that I was able to use on my 16 in rough. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinamarie Priore

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1.28 flush version first bc I though how effective could a one gallon flush be... Well I was so satisfied with the 1.28 gallon flusher that I had plenty of confidence going into the 1 gallon flusher. It is very effective and handles "all of the Yule logs that I throw down the chimney" if you know what I mean. I'll be buying another for sure
customer_reviews.author: TimE R.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about buying a water saving toilet, but I'm glad I was talked into buying this one. This toilet works great and has never clogged on us once. It looks nice and has the added advantage of being designed so that the seat is higher than a regular toilet-- a good thing for older folks who may have a tough time getting up from a regular toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy installation. This unit comes with the flange kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy installation. This unit comes with the flange kit for 12" drain to wall distance. I had to order the 10" flange, which was about $60 on Amazon. Be sure of what you need so you aren't surprised at time of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Mfm74

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet, unfortunately arrived in about a million pieces. Returned and bought from local supply house.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Beauty of the Beast.
customer_reviews.text: Classic look, comfort, fit and finish are outstanding and superior performance. Will be purchasing same unit for next bath remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: What a great toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet I've ever sat on. I'm 6'1 and the height is perfect, but my wife complained that her feet were dangling (5'6). The flush works every time and I am a big pooper (a proud one). Definitely add the bidet to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: My favorite throne
customer_reviews.text: This model has been great, and I've replaced all my old 80's toilets with this same model. Flushes well, easy to clean, and all the other things you want in a quality throne. Install is a bit odd because Toto uses a special flange that has to be attached to the floor and the plumbing, yes, which includes drilling into tile in my case. Also, the flange is designed based on the distance between the wall and the drain hole, so double check this. One of mine was 14", instead of 12", which meant buying a separate one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp Dressed

customer_reviews.title: 1.0 gpf.  And it works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works. No, I don't have the videos to prove it, but it sure can handle a load (of crap). My only complaint, as a do-it-yourself installer is that the gasket between the tank and the seat is very thick. I'm afraid to crank down on the screws for fear of breaking the ceramic. We also have a toto S300 Washlet.
customer_reviews.author: SkeetsSan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toilet, with great flushing power
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toilet, with great flushing power. I already put 3 of these into my houses, and none was ever clogged. Very easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: taranto

customer_reviews.title: toto quality
customer_reviews.text: As always with Toto it is high quality and beautifully designed, uses a small amount of water and flushes clean every time. There are cheaper toilets at the big box stores, but they are not of this quality, with a solid, soft closing seat and good looks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmo

customer_reviews.title: We have become Toto snobs. We're spoiled. Now get yourself a Washlet!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had researched these for months anticipating our renovation project. Bought one for our use and found it to be a top quality product in every way. Have since bought three for rental unit remodel. Classy piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moberg

customer_reviews.title: Great 1 Gallon Flush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toilet. Flushes great. I do not know how they can make it flush so thoroughly with only one gallon of water.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Wiedemann Jr.

customer_reviews.title: going comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet. Buy it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: cheri pysson

customer_reviews.title: simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I have had other water efficient toilets that I had to flush twice. The Toto uses a gallon of water and works well...never more than one flush. I am totally impressed by Japanese engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best...toilet...ever. Never fails to flush it all down and it cleans up easy with the Sanigloss and skirted base.
customer_reviews.author: Florida John

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the new toilet, it has a strong flush and saves water.
customer_reviews.author: Passionate cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, like my other Toto does. Neat, clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It stays clean and has given us efficient service over two years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Raji D.

customer_reviews.title: Dude... 1 Gallon... you can't beat that
customer_reviews.text: The lever on the side takes some getting used to as well as the almost complete 90 degree throw. The bowl and tank has three points of contact that you have to evenly screw down too. That was a PAIN. I am careful to now avoid commercial toilet bowl cleaners to avoid degrading the sanigloss coating. If you add a bidet to it, positioning it is more of a challenge than other toilet bowls. The nozzle can easily hit the back of the bowl after it extends so you'll have to pull it closer to the front. I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Gifford Hwa

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I had professionals install it
customer_reviews.text: Came in a LOT of packaging. Works great. I had professionals install it. So can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, love this Toto toilet
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toilet installed for almost a month and I'm really happy with this purchase. I had read some reviews about the water randomly splashing out of the bowl, and initially when it was installed this did happen a few times. But after a day or so for the toilet to settle itself, the splashing hasn't happened since. The flush is quick and efficient, it's quieter than my previous toilet, and it's very rare for any remaining residue to be left behind. The skirted design works well in my more modern bathroom, and makes cleaning a breeze. Packaging came in two boxes and both arrived well packaged and without a scratch on the porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Moynahan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Had this toilet for a few weeks and it does flush solids better than my old toilet but is not perfect. When it does clog up it is harder to unclog due to the shape of the opening at the bottom of the bowl. It has a rectangular recess above the opening so a plunger will not seal and when you "plunge" the water sprays out all over you and the toilet. I had to go buy a toilet auger to clear plugs. Definitely not worth the $400 when you include the seat and seal.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome toilet, excellent flushing for such a low flush toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeni Kovelman

customer_reviews.title: Toto Drake is great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a renovation - and it's perfect. Great silhouette, very modern. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyPie

customer_reviews.title: But the suction that toilet has is awesome almost like an si Airplane toilet and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this toilet. We had. A little issue with the installation when it came to the waterline due the to length of the toilet so we had to call out the plumber to move the line. But the suction that toilet has is awesome almost like an si Airplane toilet and it looks very nice. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet, especially for rough-in distances of 14 or 15 inches
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toilet - compact and most important, perfect for rough-in distance > 12in to move it back against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: None better great look easy too clean no clog flush I love it
customer_reviews.author: maurice maurer

customer_reviews.title: Toto's the best!
customer_reviews.text: A couple friends recommended Toto toilets to us when we were building but I couldn't find the model I wanted anywhere in town. Plumbers Outpost had them at the best price and shipped prompted upon receiving the order; S&H were free! The toilets were packaged securely and no damaged occurred. The toilets are everything the Toto website said they would be. We ordered both of them with the SanaGloss finish, making them very easy to clean, one flush takes care of everything. I really like the skirted design too. I would definitely make the same buying choice again.
customer_reviews.author: rubyslippers

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a month now, and it hasn't failed to gulp down any of our "product." I'm not giving it five stars because occasionally it will not totally rinse the bowl if there are sticky splatters higher up in the bowl (sorry to be so graphic, but it's hard to be delicate with this subject).
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: uses about the same amount of water as a dual flush, but much cheaper. always cleans the bowl. occasionally there are some streaks, but not any worse than any other toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Powers

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 totos, but this one is awesome, even better than the other model, save water, flush completely and fast.
customer_reviews.author: hcya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Toto makes a great product. Shipping was exactly as expected. No complaints at all! I highly recommend buying a toilet this way.
customer_reviews.author: docsro

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very low water flush, yet powerful. Toto is innovative and makes great products. Sanagloss is a must with the low water flushing, but it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Childs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best quality item, received in double packaging, couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel G.

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet yet...
customer_reviews.text: Had this toilet in the old house. No stains or clogs with very little cleaning. The sanagloss is amazing. I am now about to put 2 more in the new house(thats how good they are). I cannot tell you how much I enjoy the 16 in. height of the seat. Being 6 foot tall, its nice not having to eat your knees while on the thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered in one piece with no damage and installed and works amazing! I have never bought a Toto online so I was a bit nervous but I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked at many models and finally based my purchase on recommendation from family. Wanted skirted design and low water consumption. I am extremely happy and would highly suggest to friends, in spite of higher purchase price. I am planning to install a second one in master bath!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Ohlsen

customer_reviews.title: Love the new loo.
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy to clean sides. We have a Toto in our other bathroom so when getting a new toilet for our guest bathroom it was a no-brainer to get another trouble-free Toto.
customer_reviews.author: dojomo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes everything down all while using minimal water, i would recommend it to anyone that wants a quality toiet
customer_reviews.author: DuderV

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clean well, fast and very quiet. Use TOTO 3 yeas with 1.6 G. New one with 1G save more water. This time I replaced all toilets in the house.
customer_reviews.author: mARINA cHALIKOV

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The flush is amazing and style meets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The flush is amazing and style meets modern day needs
customer_reviews.author: minal patel

customer_reviews.title: so have a good plumber. Nicely engineered
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult toilet to install, so have a good plumber. Nicely engineered, quiet and fast flush. The lid to the tank was broken on arrival, so insist on special packing and a reliable shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Law

customer_reviews.title: It's a good toilet and packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toilet and packaged very well. Unfortunately after it was installed, I discovered that the covers for the nuts that fix the toilet to the floor were not in the delivered box. Absurd to return it now !
customer_reviews.author: JuanMF

customer_reviews.title: Day 2, cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Installed by the contractor. It looked fine out of the box and when installed. Next there is a large crack at the base and it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: drew bendon

product_meta.title: Toto CST474CEFGNo.01 Vespin II Two-Piece High-Efficiency Toilet, with SanaGloss, 1.28-GPF, Cotton
product_meta.description:
You want fixtures that can do it all with effortless beauty.There's only one bath manufacturer that can deliver all of that -TOTO, a global leader committed to creating products that connect you with water in ways that enrich the flow of your everyday life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
You want fixtures that can do it all with effortless beauty.There's only one bath manufacturer that can deliver all of that -TOTO, a global leader committed to creating products that connect you with water in ways that enrich the flow of your everyday life.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Double Cyclone flushing system, low consumption (1.28-GPF/4.8-LPF)
Skirted design, Universal Height, Chrome trip lever
SanaGloss ceramic glaze-prevents debris and mold from sticking to ceramic surfaces, leading to fewer chemicals and less water in cleaning
Decorative two-piece design with high-profile tank, Elongated front bowl and tank set, less seat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
